title: Will the earth stop rotating before the sun dies? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, the Earth will not stop rotating before the Sun either engulfs the Earth or turns into a white dwarf. The Moon is slowing the Earth's rotation down, but it cannot stop the Earth from rotating entirely as a result of the conservation of angular momentum and the nature of the transfer of angular momentum from the Earth to the Moon. To stop the Earth from spinning or to get it spinning in the opposite direction, the Earth would have to be hit by a separate object going against the spin of the Earth.

Yes, the Earths rotation can be, and is slowed down.  The moon slows the rotation of the Earth.  It lengthens the day by 1.7 milliseconds per century.  Thats .001 seconds every 100 years.  Or .00001 seconds a year, .000000027 seconds a day.
